alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:14PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lafayette, eastern Taylor and eastern Madison Counties through MIDNIGHT EST... At 1114 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Lake Park to 12 miles northwest of Steinhatchee. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Steinhatchee, Lee, Pinland, Fish Creek, Cooks Hammock, Howell Place, Chancey, Smith, Buckville, Carbur, Mayo Junction, Townsend, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Salem, Blue Springs, Athena, San Pedro Junction, Day and Cedar Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EST for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
